Additional Editors
==================

Advanced editing tools and specialized interfaces for professional sound design and performance.

Available Editors
=================

* :doc:`Arpeggiator Editor <arpeggiator>` - Sophisticated pattern generation and sequencing
* :doc:`Effects Editor <effects>` - Master effects processing with reverb, delay, and more
* :doc:`Vocal Effects Editor <vocal_effects>` - Advanced vocal processing and voice transformation
